Title: THE MANLY GUIDE TO MANMODE HUSKAR 6.81

ItemTooltips.branches: GG BRANCHES FOR A GOOD GAME
ItemTooltips.hand_of_midas: THIS WILL LET YOU GET MORE FREE FARM. GET IT ONLY IF YOU CAN GET IT BEFORE 10 MINUTE MARK.
ItemTooltips.mekansm: GIVES YOU A USE FOR YOUR MANA POOL AND LETS YOU HEAL THE FUCK UP IN FIGHTS, BRETTY GUD IF NO ONE ON YOUR TEAM GOT IT YET.
ItemTooltips.urn_of_shadows: WITH THIS AND INNER VITALITY EVERY TIME YOU FRAG SOMEONE YOU GET BACK TO FULL HEALTH.
ItemTooltips.heart: MAKES YOU IMMORTAL. ALSO MAKES YOU HIT HARDER.
ItemTooltips.blade_mail: GROW SPIKES AND BECOME INTIMIDATING. USE THIS IN CONJUNCTION WITH MASK OF MADNESS TO INCREASE DAMAGE REFLECTED.
ItemTooltips.rapier: ONLY BUY IT IF YOU'RE INSANE/THROWING/FED/ME
ItemTooltips.radiance: THIS WILL MAKE PEOPLE ABSOLUTELY HAVE TO FOCUS YOU, SO YOU CAN EASILY PUNISH THEM WITH YOUR SPIKESHIRT.
ItemTooltips.mask_of_madness: GIVES YOU ATTACK SPEED EVEN WHEN YOU'RE ON FULL HEALTH, MAKES BURNING SPEARS FREE TO CAST, AND MAKES YOU TAKE MORE DAMAGE WHICH MAKES IT THE MANLIEST ITEM.

AbilityTooltips.huskar_inner_vitality: THIS WILL LET YOU HEAL YOURSELF OR YOUR UNMANLY ALLIES AT THE COST OF YOUR USELESS MANA.
AbilityTooltips.huskar_burning_spear: SETTING PEOPLE ON FIRE BY THROWING SPEARS AT THEM IS SO MANLY IT HURTS YOU.
AbilityTooltips.huskar_berserkers_blood: THE MORE PEOPLE HIT YOU THE MANLIER YOU GET.
